pi#tRuqNAmiqdamaqhaM nirvaru#Nasyaq pASAqdityA#ha varuNapAqSAdEqva nirmu#cyaqtE &gnE$ vratapata AqtmanaqH pUrvA# taqnUrAqdEyEtyA#huqH kO hi tadvEdaq yad vasI#yAqnth svE vaSE# BUqtE puna#rvAq dadA#tiq na vEtiq grAvA#NOq vai sOma#syaq rAj~jO# malimlusEqnA ya EqvaM ~MviqdvAn grAv^^NNaqq AgnI$ddhra upavAqsaya#tiq naina#M malimlusEqnA vi#ndati ( ) || 12 
(atha#-dadatEq - svayAq - santh - sva#dhAkAqrO hi - vi#ndati) (A2)
